text: Alan from Eunos Bus Interchange is the hair stylist for my two boys. He is friendly and the cutting skill is good. Highly recommended!
Alan Lim, fantastic hair dresser. He has been attending to me for a long time. Very professional and skilled. An asset to your organisation.
Alan is a consistently good barber. I appreciate his services, and regularly come for my cuts.
Alan is a great barber! He is meticulous and always ensures a fast, clean and precise haircut. Highly recommend him for great service!

Just had a haircut at this outlet by Jennifer. Before i even get a chance to sit down, she was hounding me about entering the lucky draw by giving her 5 stars on the app. I couldn’t find it on the app and even showed her but she just keeps on asking me to do it. When i finally sat down, she used a shaver that still has the  previous customer’s hair on it. It’s obvious because it’s white hair on a black shaver. The entire haircut was very uncomfortable too as she does a very rough cut. I just can’t wait to get out of the shop. When i check it back at home, it’s so uneven i wanted to go to another salon to cut it again. It’s disappointing since i’ve been a regular customer at various kcuts outlet including this one at eunos, previous haircut by alan. Be warned if you see Jennifer there
